rukus.text: Sab tareef Allah Taalaa kay liye hai jo tamam jahanon ka palney wala hai
Bara meharban nihayat reham kerney wala
Badlay kay din (yani qayamat) ka maalik hai

Hum sirf teri hi ibadat kertay hain aur sirf tujh hi say madad chahatay hain Shuroo Allah kay naam say jo bara meharban nehayat reham kerney wala hai 94.1. Kiya hum nay tera seena nahi khol diya 94.2. Aur tujh per say tera bojh hum ney utar diya 94.3. Jiss nay teri peth tordi thi 94.4. Aur hum nay tera zikar buland kerdiya
Pus yaqenan mushkil kay sath asani hai
By-shak mushkil kay sath asani hai
Pus jab to farigh ho to ibadat mein mehnat ker
Aur apney parwardigar hi ki tareef mein dil laga
